headline.main: 23 NAZI BLOWS FAIL TO RETAKE KEY HILL; Russians Hold Captured Height on Central Front Against Insistent Attacks

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Friday, July 2 (AP) -- Russian troops have captured a "German height of great strategic importance" on the front northwest of Moscow and held it against twenty-three counter-attacks in which the enemy lost 600 dead, Moscow announced early today.
abstract: USSR forces take key hill west of Moscow; hold it against 23 counter-attacks; local clashes reptd; Gers renew drive on Partisans in occupied area; attempt to sow discord cited; USSR Army pilots rescue USSR orphans from occupied regions
